manuscript_citation: Berger AK, Yi H, Kearns DB, Mainou BA (2017) Bacteria and bacterial envelope components enhance mammalian reovirus thermostability. PLoS Pathog 13(12): e1006768. doi: 10.1371/journal.ppat.1006768
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"2hfrk","text":"Pellet 4x108 spinner-adapted L929 at 2000 x g for 10 min at 4\u00b0C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":11,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"6221E0C7083049A4B8229BBA00023B02","id":682323,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":""}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ftv3i","text":"Remove supernatant (can be added back to 1 L bottle to be used during infection).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91hui","text":"Resuspend cells in total volume of 40 ml (virus in Joklik\u2019s Minimum Essential Media without supplements, JMEM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2njc1","text":"a. Adsorb for 1 h at room temperature with passage 2 or viral prep supernatant at an MOI of 10 PFU\/cell with gentle shaking on orbital shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dt81","text":"Add adsorption mixture to 760 ml JMEM supplemented with 5% FBS, 2mM L-Glutamine, 100 U penicillin per ml, 100 ug streptomycin per ml, and 0.25 mg per ml amphotericin B","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ci1up","text":"Incubate on a spinner plate at 34-37\u00b0C with environmental CO2 for 72 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":60,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6rqvu","text":"Spin at 2500 x g for 10 min at 4\u00b0C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f75fe","text":"Remove supernatant and resuspend cells in 7 mL of HO buffer. Suspension may be stored at -20-80\u00b0C at this step. If using immediately one freeze\/thaw cycle is recommended. Supernatants of infections started with passage 2 reovirus can be stored at 80\u00b0C and used for future viral purifications.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8h315","text":"Thaw HO suspension on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b20ju","text":"Add 100 ul 10% DOC per tube and incubate on ice for >30 min, vortexing every 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bfh18","text":"Add 2.5 mL Vertrel XF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"flh47","text":"Sonicate on ice for 1 min to disrupt cells and place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"u7j8","text":"Add additional 2.5 mL Vertrel XF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dtfi0","text":"Sonicate on ice for 1 min to disrupt cells and place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2fifu","text":"Centrifuge at 9700 x g for 10 min at 4\u00b0C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7atos","text":"Transfer aqueous (top) layer to a clean tube and discard pellets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"qc69","text":"Add 2.5 mL Vertrel XF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1qu0o","text":"Sonicate on ice for 1 min to disrupt cells and place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"furb","text":"Centrifuge at 9700 x g for 10 min at 4\u00b0C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92hpd","text":"During second centrifugation step prepare CsCl gradient:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"57tct","text":"a. Add 2.5 mL 1.2 g\/mL CsCl and gently underlay with 2.5 mL 1.4 g\/mL CsCl being careful to not mix layers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5gego","text":"Carefully layer aqueous (top) fraction onto CsCl gradient. Balance tubes with HO buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"32gjs","text":"Spin at 25000 RPM overnight at 5\u00b0C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5onsb","text":"Wipe bottom of tube with ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ap6o5","text":"Puncture the bottom of the tube with an 18.5-gauge needle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45qlq","text":"Collect virus fraction (bottom band) and top-component (top band) into a clean tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5j8sg","text":"Dialyze exhaustively against 400-500 mL cold dialysis buffer for at least 24 h at 4\u00b0C. (Change buffer after 1 h, 4 h, and next morning).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"asd7s","text":"Transfer to new tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ak38l","text":"Determine particle density (1 OD260 = 2.1 x 1012 particles\/mL = 185 ug viral protein\/mL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"676fj","text":"Store at 4\u00b0C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
